siteMetadata.title: rantum.dev
siteMetadata.subtitle: digital dwelling of andrew maury. digital developer @ecomloop in burlingame, ca. san matean nantucketer on a rantum scoot.

frontmatter.title: Adventurous perspective
frontmatter.description: Yvon Choinard says "Adventure begins when everything goes wrong." Another perspective is to approach days and projects as adventures, knowing everything will not go right. The destination is often less important than the adventure, like any good rantum scoot.

frontmatter.title: Momentary perspective shifts
frontmatter.description: Everyone comes to a situation with a different mindset, and often different goals in mind. Seek other perspectives momentarily and realize there's more than one method.

frontmatter.title: Filtered perspectives
frontmatter.description: There's no true unbiased approach. Keep others' perspectives in mind and work to adjust own filters to better match.
